message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a mutually beneficial deal. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1,200,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer.  While I recognize the value of the product, that price point is a little high for me. I'd be willing to purchase it for $800,000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $800,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $1,000,000.
